problems.title: Convert an Array into a Max Heap (Heapify Technique)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given an array of N integers. Convert the array into a Max Heap using the heapify technique.
Use downward heapify from the last non-leaf node to the root.
Finally, print the array after building the Max Heap.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
6
1 3 5 4 6 13

Sample Output
13 6 5 4 3 1

Explanation:
The given array converted to a Max Heap becomes level-wise: 13 6 5 4 3 1
